content: When your mind is racing, try to bring yourself back to where your feet are. Look around and name five things you can see, right now. Maybe a lamp, a shadow, the texture of the wall. Then find four things you can touch. Three things you can hear. It's a way of reminding yourself that you are here, and you are safe.
title: Coming Back to the Present

content: If you're feeling untethered, try holding something coldâ€”like an ice cube or even just a cold glass of water. Focus entirely on that sensation. How cold it feels, how it changes. It's a sharp, clear way to pull your attention back into your body.
title: The Cold Reset

content: Take a moment to just notice the weight of your body in your chair or against the floor. Feel the ground supporting you. You don't have to carry yourself right now; the world is holding you up. Just breathe into that support for a second.
title: Feeling the Support
